metadata.title: CVE-2020-6537 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Type confusion in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 84.0.4147.105 allowed aremote attacker to execute arbitrary code inside a sandbox via a craftedHTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libv8-3.14: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
